casebody.data:
[Cite as 03/04/2004 Case Announcements, 2004-Ohio-968.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

March 4, 2004

DISCIPLINARY CASES

2004-0066. In re Resignation of Perkins.

This cause is pending before the court upon the filing by Roger Paul Perkins Jr., Attorney Registration No. 0018217, of an affidavit of resignation. On February 24, 2004, Roger Paul Perkins Jr. filed an application to withdraw the affidavit of resignation. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the application be, and hereby is, granted.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that this case be, and hereby is, dismissed.
